verses.verse: A Psalm of David, <S%H1732><s%> when he changed <S%H8138><s%> his behaviour <S%H2940><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Abimelech; <S%H40><s%> who drove <S%H1644><s%> him away, and he departed. <S%H3212><s%> I will bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> times: <S%H6256><s%> his praise <S%H8416><s%> shall continually <S%H8548><s%> be in my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall make her boast <S%H1984><s%> in the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> the humble <S%H6041><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> thereof, and be glad. <S%H8056><s%>
O magnify <S%H1431><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with me, and let us exalt <S%H7311><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
I sought <S%H1875><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from all <S%H3605><s%> my fears. <S%H4035><s%>
They looked <S%H5027><s%> to him, and were lightened: <S%H5102><s%> and their faces <S%H6440><s%> were not ashamed. <S%H2659><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> poor <S%H6041><s%> man cried, <S%H7121><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> him, and saved <S%H3467><s%> him out of all <S%H3605><s%> his troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> encamps <S%H2583><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him, and delivers <S%H2502><s%> them.
O taste <S%H2938><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good: <S%H2896><s%> blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> that trusts <S%H2620><s%> in him.
O fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you his saints: <S%H6918><s%> for there is no <S%H369><s%> want <S%H4270><s%> to them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him.

The young <S%H3715><s%> lions <S%H3715><s%> do lack, <S%H7326><s%> and suffer hunger: <S%H7456><s%> but they that seek <S%H1875><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall not want <S%H2637><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> thing.
Come, <S%H3212><s%> you children, <S%H1121><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me: I will teach <S%H3925><s%> you the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is he that desires <S%H2655><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> and loves <S%H157><s%> many days, <S%H3117><s%> that he may see <S%H7200><s%> good? <S%H2896><s%>
Keep <S%H5341><s%> your tongue <S%H3956><s%> from evil, <S%H7451><s%> and your lips <S%H8193><s%> from speaking <S%H1696><s%> guile. <S%H4820><s%>
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil, <S%H7451><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> good; <S%H2896><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and pursue <S%H7291><s%> it.
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are on the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and his ears <S%H241><s%> are open to their cry. <S%H7775><s%>
The face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is against them that do <S%H6213><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> to cut <S%H3772><s%> off the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of them from the earth. <S%H776><s%>
The righteous cry, <S%H6817><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hears, <S%H8085><s%> and delivers <S%H5337><s%> them out of all <S%H3605><s%> their troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7126><s%> to them that are of a broken <S%H7665><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> and saves <S%H3467><s%> such as be of a contrite <S%H1793><s%> spirit. <S%H7307><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> are the afflictions <S%H7451><s%> of the righteous: <S%H6662><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivers <S%H5337><s%> him out of them all. <S%H3605><s%>
He keeps <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his bones: <S%H6106><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> of them is broken. <S%H7665><s%>
Evil <S%H7451><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> the wicked: <S%H7563><s%> and they that hate <S%H8130><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be desolate. <S%H816><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> redeems <S%H6299><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of his servants: <S%H5650><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> of them that trust <S%H2620><s%> in him shall be desolate. <S%H816><s%>
